title: Champ Select won't transition to loading screen
body: I've had 3 ranked games where, as soon as champ select was done and the client was minimized, the loading screen wouldn't show up. I've lost a rank and about 30 LP on top of that because I don't know what's causing it or what to do when it happens.

replies.body: Same thing is happening to me. Hope they fix this soon before I get banned for being afk

"fix it soon" 

AHAHAHAHA

Dude this problem is live since AT LEAST 4 weeks.
I haven't played for weeks until just the other day
